config_description: /** * Database setting OPTIMIZE_IN_LIST (default: true). * Optimize IN(...) and IN(SELECT ...) comparisons. This includes * optimization for SELECT, DELETE, and UPDATE. */
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration OPTIMIZE_IN_LIST is used in the code to optimize the performance of IN(...) and IN(SELECT ...) comparisons. It includes optimization for SELECT, DELETE, and UPDATE operations.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration OPTIMIZE_IN_LIST is triggered whenever the session's database setting for optimizeInList is true.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the OPTIMIZE_IN_LIST configuration option is that it improves the performance of queries involving the use of IN(...) and IN(SELECT ...) comparisons, resulting in faster execution of SELECT, DELETE, and UPDATE operations.
